00027 #ifndef __ED_NUMINPUT_H__
00028 #define __ED_NUMINPUT_H__
00029 
00030 
00031 /*
00032  *  The ctrl value has different meaning:
00033  *      0           : No value has been typed
00034  *
00035  *      otherwise, |value| - 1 is where the cursor is located after the period
00036  *      Positive    : number is positive
00037  *      Negative    : number is negative
00038  */
00039 
00040 typedef struct NumInput {
00041     short  idx;
00042     short  idx_max;
00043     short  flag;        /* Different flags to indicate different behaviors                                */
00044     char   inv[3];      /* If the value is inverted or not                                                */
00045     float  val[3];      /* Direct value of the input                                                      */
00046     int    ctrl[3];     /* Control to indicate what to do with the numbers that are typed                 */
00047     float  increment;
00048 } NumInput;
00049 
00050 /* NUMINPUT FLAGS */
00051 #define NUM_NULL_ONE        2
00052 #define NUM_NO_NEGATIVE     4
00053 #define NUM_NO_ZERO         8
00054 #define NUM_NO_FRACTION     16
00055 #define NUM_AFFECT_ALL      32
00056 
00057 /*********************** NumInput ********************************/
00058 
00059 void initNumInput(NumInput *n);
00060 void outputNumInput(NumInput *n, char *str);
00061 short hasNumInput(NumInput *n);
00062 void applyNumInput(NumInput *n, float *vec);
00063 char handleNumInput(NumInput *n, struct wmEvent *event);
00064 
00065 #define NUM_MODAL_INCREMENT_UP   18
00066 #define NUM_MODAL_INCREMENT_DOWN 19
00067 
00068 #endif
